content.text: Match ends, Sunderland 0, Southampton 1.

Substitution, Southampton. Steven Caulker replaces Dusan Tadic.
Attempt missed. Jack Rodwell (Sunderland) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Duncan Watmore with a cross following a set piece situation.
